alert.note: Alert for Luce (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 7:23PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Luce County through 745 PM EDT... At 723 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles south of Muskallonge State Park to Manistique Lake. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Newberry, McMillan, Manistique Lake, Helmer, Four Mile Corner, Dollarville and Pine Stump Junction. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until these storms pass.
